author: Special Correspondent
text:
Revenue section on Tirunelveli Collectorate premises wears a deserted look on Tuesday following the strike by revenue department staff.— Photo: A. Shaikmohideen

Functioning of revenue department offices across the district was paralyzed completely as officials struck work on Tuesday to press their demands.

Demanding the filling up of 10,000-odd vacancies in the revenue department, better pay scale for tahsildars, regularisation of service of temporary workers appointed in the election and special scheme sections etc. the revenue department officials went on strike on Tuesday to affect the routine functioning of these offices. Consequently, the public, who came to the revenue department offices for getting a range of certificates, were affected.

To continue tomorrow

The strike would continue tomorrow also.
title: Revenue department staff strike work
